trans-unit.source: Represents a scaled view of the chart.
trans-unit.target: 表示图表的扩展的视图。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets a flag that indicates whether the axis is zoomed in.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个标志，指示是否放大轴。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the axis is zoomed in; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果是否放大轴;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的最小大小<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> that represents the minimum size of the scale view.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref>表示缩放视图的最小大小。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the unit of measurement of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.MinSize*> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的度量单位<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.MinSize*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.MinSize*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"></xref> enumeration value that represents the unit of measurement of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.MinSize*> property.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"> </xref>枚举值，该值表示的度量单位<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.MinSize*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.MinSize*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the position of the scale view.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置缩放视图的位置。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> that represents the position of the scale view.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> ，表示缩放视图的位置。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls to a position along an axis specified by the newPosition parameter, which is expressed as a value.
trans-unit.target: 滚动到指定的轴的位置 newPosition 参数，它表示为值。

trans-unit.source: The new position to scroll.
trans-unit.target: 要向下滚动的新位置。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls to a position along an axis specified by the newPosition parameter.
trans-unit.target: 滚动到指定的轴的位置 newPosition 参数。

trans-unit.source: The new position to scroll.
trans-unit.target: 要向下滚动的新位置。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls along an axis according to the direction and size indicated by the scrollType parameter.
trans-unit.target: 根据的方向和大小的轴滚动由 scrollType 参数。

trans-unit.source: The direction and size to scroll.
trans-unit.target: 方向和大小，以向下滚动。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of the scale view.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置缩放视图的大小。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> that represents the size of the scale view.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref>表示缩放视图的大小。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the unit of measurement for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.Size*> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的度量单位<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.Size*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.Size*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"></xref> enumeration value that represents the unit of measurement for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.Size*> property.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"> </xref>枚举值，该值表示的度量单位<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.Size*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.Size*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum small scrolling size.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置最小的小滚动大小。

trans-unit.source: Used only if the small scrolling size is not set.
trans-unit.target: 未设置滚动较小的情况下，才使用。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> that represents the small scrolling size.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref>表示滚动最小大小。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the unit of measurement for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.SmallScrollMinSize*> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的度量单位<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.SmallScrollMinSize*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.SmallScrollMinSize*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"></xref> enumeration value that represents the unit of measurement for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.SmallScrollMinSize*> property.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"> </xref>枚举值，该值表示的度量单位<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.SmallScrollMinSize*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.SmallScrollMinSize*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the small scrolling size.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置滚动较小。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the small scrolling size.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref>表示滚动较小的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the unit of measurement for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.SmallScrollMinSize*> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的度量单位<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.SmallScrollMinSize*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.SmallScrollMinSize*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"></xref> enumeration value that represents the unit of measurement for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.SmallScrollMinSize*> property.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"> </xref>枚举值，该值表示的度量单位<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.SmallScrollMinSize*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.SmallScrollMinSize*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the maximum axis value of a data view.
trans-unit.target: 获取数据视图的最大的轴值。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> that represents the maximum axis value for the data view.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> ，表示数据视图的最大的轴值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the minimum axis value of a data view.
trans-unit.target: 获取数据视图的最小轴值。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> that represents the minimum axis value for the data view.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> ，表示数据视图的最小轴值。

trans-unit.source: Sets a new axis data view and/or position based on the specified start and end values.
trans-unit.target: 设置新的轴数据视图和/或根据指定的开始和结束值的位置。

trans-unit.source: The new start position for the axis scale view.
trans-unit.target: 轴缩放视图新起始位置。

trans-unit.source: The new end position for the axis scale view.
trans-unit.target: 轴缩放视图新结束位置。

trans-unit.source: Sets a new axis data view and/or position based on the specified start position, view size and unit of measurement.
trans-unit.target: 设置新的轴数据视图和/或根据指定的开始位置、 视图大小和度量单位的位置。

trans-unit.source: The new start position for the axis scale view.
trans-unit.target: 轴缩放视图新起始位置。

trans-unit.source: The new size for the axis scale view.
trans-unit.target: 。 轴缩放视图的新大小。

trans-unit.source: The new unit of measurement of the size.
trans-unit.target: 新的大小的度量单位。

trans-unit.source: Sets a new axis data view and/or position based on the specified start position, view size, unit of measurement and save state.
trans-unit.target: 设置新的轴数据视图和/或位置根据指定的开始位置中，查看大小，度量单位和保存状态。

trans-unit.source: The new start position for the axis scale view.
trans-unit.target: 轴缩放视图新起始位置。

trans-unit.source: The new size for the axis scale view.
trans-unit.target: 。 轴缩放视图的新大小。

trans-unit.source: The new unit of measurement of the size.
trans-unit.target: 新的大小的度量单位。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the current size and/or position must be saved.
trans-unit.target: 该值指示是否必须保存当前大小和/或位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether the zooming user interface is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个标志，指示是否启用了缩放用户界面。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the zooming user interface is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果启用了缩放用户界面;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Resets one zoom operation by restoring the axis data view.
trans-unit.target: 通过还原轴数据视图重置一个缩放操作。

trans-unit.source: Resets the specified number of zoom operations by restoring the axis data view.
trans-unit.target: 通过还原轴数据视图重置指定的数目的缩放操作。

trans-unit.source: Set the `numberOfViews` parameter to zero (0) to reset all zoom operations.
trans-unit.target: 设置`numberOfViews`为零 (0)，以重置所有的缩放操作的参数。

trans-unit.source: Number of zoom operations to reset.
trans-unit.target: 若要重置的缩放操作数目。
